description: An easy trail with spectacular views. Cool ocean breezes will guide you from Moulton Meadows Park in a residential neighborhood along the ridge line between Hobo Canyon and Aliso Canyon through sage brush and canyon views to this awesome overlook to the Pacific Ocean.
directions: The trail begins on the southeastern side of the park on a rise behind the restrooms. N33 31.706 W117 45.175
title: Ocean Lookout from Moulton Meadows Park
